AdditionalFields.Value: Drug Development,Bioinformatics / Convergence Science / Systems Biology

Description: Radiotheranostics is a rapidly emerging field of medicine that that combines specific targeted therapy based on specific targeted diagnostic tests and provides a transition from conventional medicine to a more contemporary personalized and precision medicine approach. This session will include presentations from speakers with expertise in the preclinical development and testing of theranostics, the translation of theranostics into the clinic and patient management, and the commercialization and FDA approval of radiotherapeutics. The topics covered will include the types of radiotheranostics currently available as well as under development, challenges associated with the development and adoption of theranostics, dosimetry and a perspective on the future of theranostics.
SearchResultBody: ADT08. Theranostics: The Interception of Detection and Treatment
Title: Theranostics: The Interception of Detection and Treatment
